grade: Jōyō kanji, taught in junior high
on reading compounds: 升【ショウ】shō, traditional unit of volume, approx. 1.8 litres
一升【イッショウ】unit of old Japanese liquid measurement, 1800 cc
kun reading compounds: 升【ます】measuring container, measure, box (seating at a theatre, etc.), square on a grid, cell of a grid, square bearing block (at the top of a pillar)
升売り【ますうり】selling something by the boxful (in a wooden masu box)
